JoinSplashInfo.Subtitle: Phase 1: New File Format
JoinSplashInfo.Title: Test out phase 1 of saving V2!

Sections.Title: Phase 1: New File Format (NOW IN TESTING)
Sections.Body:
• Save 10k parts in less than 5 seconds
• Fit over 200k parts in a file without reaching size limit
• Export to / Import from RBXM (Seperate studio plugin, coming soon)
We are aware of issues with some wiring parts and are working on this!

Content.Body: We are exited to announce that phase one of saving v2 has been released for public testing.
